mapper.sql: id, statistics_day,total_register_population, register_population, register_exp_count, real_exp_count, virtual_exp_count, new_user_recharge_population, new_user_recharge_count, new_user_recharge_amount, new_user_login_count, new_user_play_count, old_user_recharge_population, old_user_recharge_count, old_user_recharge_amount, old_user_login_count, old_user_play_count, next_day_stay_count, execute_time
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(register_population) AS register_population_sum, SUM(register_exp_count) AS register_exp_count_sum, SUM(real_exp_count) AS real_exp_count_sum, SUM(virtual_exp_count) AS virtual_exp_count_sum, SUM(new_user_recharge_population) AS new_user_recharge_population_sum, SUM(new_user_recharge_count) AS new_user_recharge_count_sum, SUM(new_user_recharge_amount) AS new_user_recharge_amount_sum, SUM(new_user_login_count) AS new_user_login_count_sum, SUM(new_user_play_count) AS new_user_play_count_sum, SUM(old_user_recharge_population) AS old_user_recharge_population_sum, SUM(old_user_recharge_count) AS old_user_recharge_count_sum, SUM(old_user_recharge_amount) AS old_user_recharge_amount_sum, SUM(old_user_login_count) AS old_user_login_count_sum, SUM(old_user_play_count) AS old_user_play_count_sum, SUM(next_day_stay_count) AS next_day_stay_count_sum FROM daily_composite_report WHERE statistics_day >= #{lastMonthFirstDayStr} AND statistics_day <= #{lastMonthEndDayStr}
mapper.insert: insert into daily_composite_report (id, statistics_day, total_register_population, register_population, register_exp_count, real_exp_count, virtual_exp_count, new_user_recharge_population, new_user_recharge_count, new_user_recharge_amount, new_user_login_count, new_user_play_count, old_user_recharge_population, old_user_recharge_count, old_user_recharge_amount, old_user_login_count, old_user_play_count, next_day_stay_count, execute_time) values (#{id}, #{statisticsDay},#{totalRegisterPopulation}, #{registerPopulation}, #{registerExpCount}, #{realExpCount}, #{virtualExpCount}, #{newUserRechargePopulation}, #{newUserRechargeCount}, #{newUserRechargeAmount}, #{newUserLoginCount}, #{newUserPlayCount}, #{oldUserRechargePopulation}, #{oldUserRechargeCount}, #{oldUserRechargeAmount}, #{oldUserLoginCount}, #{oldUserPlayCount}, #{nextDayStayCount}, #{executeTime})

id,
statistics_day,
register_population,
register_exp_count,

new_user_login_count,
new_user_play_count,
old_user_recharge_population,
old_user_recharge_count,
old_user_recharge_amount,
old_user_login_count,
old_user_play_count,
next_day_stay_count,
execute_time,

mapper.update:
update daily_composite_report
statistics_day = #{statisticsDay},
register_population = #{registerPopulation},
register_exp_count = #{registerExpCount},
real_exp_count = #{realExpCount},
virtual_exp_count = #{virtualExpCount},
new_user_recharge_population = #{newUserRechargePopulation},
new_user_recharge_count = #{newUserRechargeCount},
new_user_recharge_amount = #{newUserRechargeAmount},
new_user_login_count = #{newUserLoginCount},
new_user_play_count = #{newUserPlayCount},
old_user_recharge_population = #{oldUserRechargePopulation},
old_user_recharge_count = #{oldUserRechargeCount},
old_user_recharge_amount = #{oldUserRechargeAmount},
old_user_login_count = #{oldUserLoginCount},
old_user_play_count = #{oldUserPlayCount},
next_day_stay_count = #{nextDayStayCount},
execute_time = #{executeTime},
where id = #{id}

update daily_composite_report set statistics_day = #{statisticsDay}, register_population = #{registerPopulation}, register_exp_count = #{registerExpCount}, real_exp_count = #{realExpCount}, virtual_exp_count = #{virtualExpCount}, new_user_recharge_population = #{newUserRechargePopulation}, new_user_recharge_count = #{newUserRechargeCount}, new_user_recharge_amount = #{newUserRechargeAmount}, new_user_login_count = #{newUserLoginCount}, new_user_play_count = #{newUserPlayCount}, old_user_recharge_population = #{oldUserRechargePopulation}, old_user_recharge_count = #{oldUserRechargeCount}, old_user_recharge_amount = #{oldUserRechargeAmount}, old_user_login_count = #{oldUserLoginCount}, old_user_play_count = #{oldUserPlayCount}, next_day_stay_count = #{nextDayStayCount}, execute_time = #{executeTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select DATE_FORMAT(statistics_day,'%Y-%m-%d') as statisticsDay, register_population as registerPopulation, register_exp_count as registerExpCount, real_exp_count as realExpCount, virtual_exp_count as virtualExpCount, new_user_recharge_population as newUserRechargePopulation, new_user_recharge_count as newUserRechargeCount, new_user_recharge_amount as new_user_recharge_amount, new_user_login_count as newUserLoginCount, new_user_play_count as newUserPlayCount, old_user_recharge_population as oldUserRechargePopulation, old_user_recharge_count as oldUserRechargeCount, old_user_recharge_amount as oldUserRechargeAmount, old_user_login_count as oldUserLoginCount, old_user_play_count as oldUserPlayCount, next_day_stay_count as nextDayStayCount from daily_composite_report
and statistics_day >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and statistics_day <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by statistics_day desc
